verbose_text: The present study found that IR induced retinal injury resulted in a 2.62-fold increase of apoptotic cells in the GCL and INL at 24 h. Of note, significantly fewer apoptotic RGCs and cells in the INL were present in the simvastatin/IR group compared to those in the saline/IR group.
evidence: IR-induced retinal injury resulted in a 2.62-fold increase of apoptotic cells in the GCL
